items.title: WATCH:  Skier survives after triggering avalanche in Canadian Rockies
items.description: Video captures the heart-stopping moment the mountainside gives way during the backcountry run.

items.title: WATCH:  Investigation underway after NASA jet's fiery hard landing in Texas
items.description: The jet's landing gear appears to fail before the aircraft skids on its belly across the runway with flames trailing behind it.

items.title: WATCH:  Mayor survives RPG assassin attempt in Philippines
items.description: Security cameras captured the moment suspects launched an RPG attack on a mayor in the Philippines, striking his SUV on the street. The mayor is OK, b...

items.title: Amazon to reduce workforce by 16,000, company says in email to staff
items.description: Amazon has been "working to strengthen our organization by reducing layers."

items.title: Minneapolis live updates: Stephen Miller says CBP may not have followed protocol
items.description: The Trump administration is grappling with the fallout from the Minneapolis shooting.
